DOC.brief_title: Evaluation CooperVision , Inc. Fanfilcon A Enfilcon A Daily Wear Contact Lenses When Used Frequent Replacement One ( 1 ) Month Daily Wear
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize study contact lenses two one ( 2:1 ) ratio fanfilcon A lens ( test ) enfilcon A lens ( control ) . This result study population approximately 60 test subject 30 control subject .
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year age date evaluation study . Have : Read Informed Consent Been give explanation Informed Consent Indicated understanding Informed Consent Signed Informed Consent document . Be willing able adhere instruction set forth protocol able keep specified appointment . Be adapt , current fulltime silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer . An adapted fulltime wearer define wear contact lenses least 5 day per week least 8 hour per day least one month prior participation study . Possess obtain prior dispensing , wearable visually functional ( 20/40 well ) eyeglass . Be good general health , base his/her knowledge . Require spectacle lens power 0.50 8.00 diopter sphere 1.50 diopter refractive astigmatism willing wear contact lenses eye . Have manifest refraction Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) equal good than20/25 eye . To eligible lens dispense , subject must achieve 20/30 VA good eye study lens investigator must judge fit acceptable optimal . Wearing lens monovision modality unwilling fit distance lenses eye duration study . Note : Subjects may wear lens monovision modality time study interfere visual acuity analysis . Poor personal hygiene . Any active participation another clinical trial trial within 30 day prior study . To best subject 's knowledge , currently pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy within next 3 month . A member , relative household member investigator investigational office staff . Has know sensitivity ingredient use MultiPurpose Disinfection Lens Care System ( MPS ) approve use study unable unwilling use alternate care system . Previous refractive surgery ; current previous orthokeratology treatment . Is aphakic pseudophakic . Ocular systemic disease , limited : anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) , glaucoma , Sj√∂gren 's syndrome , lupus erythematosus , scleroderma , keratoconus uncontrolled diabetes . The need topical ocular medication systemic medication might interfere contact lens wear require lens remove day . The presence clinically significant ( grade 2 , 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality ; presence inflammation iritis ; infection eye , lid , associate structure . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) , corneal ulcer , corneal infiltrates , iritis , bacterial fungal infection . A history papillary conjunctivitis interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear , include limited : Pathological dry eye associate dry eye symptom decrease tear level punctuate stain > Grade 2 Pterygium Corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization ghost vessel > 1.0 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) > Grade 2 Anterior uveitis iritis Seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis blepharitis
